formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Between °C, K, °F, °R: K = °C + 273.15 °F = °C × 9/5 + 32 °R = K × 9/5 °C = (°F − 32) × 5/9 K = °R × 5/9 Legacy scales (via °C): °Re = °C × 4/5 °De = (100 − °C) × 3/2 °N = °C × 33/100 °Rø = °C × 21/40 + 7.5 The converter internally normalizes any input to Kelvin and then outputs all supported scales to avoid cumulative rounding error.
